Position: Digital Marketing Coordinator Co-op

Organization: Wireless PnC Inc.

Duration: 8 months (extendable)

Start date: May 1 2025

Location: Remote. Anywhere within Canada

Compensation: $3,020 gross per month working 35 hours per week.

Company Description

Wireless PnC Inc. is a cleantech company headquartered in Victoria, BC. We develop universal level 2 wireless charging stations to support the standardization of low-GHG emission EV charging units. Our solutions pose particular value for environmentally conscious individuals and corporations by reducing charging anxiety and increasing charging access to support the transition to clean transport.

Our mission is to inspire a generation where "charging" is no longer seen as synonymous with "plugs" by improving access to fast, wireless chargers applicable to all types, sizes and brands of EVs.

Job Description

We are looking for an independent and self-driven Digital Marketing Coordinator Co-op who is passionate about clean technologies. You will work autonomously under the guidance of an experienced supervisor and collaborate closely with a dedicated team of skilled engineers, fostering a dynamic feedback loop where you provide and receive high-level feedback. Your full scope of the job responsibilities is as follows:

Design and update our WordPress website interface design.
Analyze the effectiveness of digital marketing campaigns, interpret data to measure performance, and prepare detailed reports with insights and recommendations.
Boost the company's online presence by performing SEO on the website.
Generate digital ads, digital graphics, and videos.
Create and design original assets of the Wireless PnC products.
Create and design engaging, informative, and brand-consistent content for all social channels.
Develop a strong brand community on our social media channels through regular interaction and posting.
Conduct market research and build the company's digital advertising campaigns.
Assist with paid digital advertising initiatives, including Google Ads and social media advertisements.
Engage with prospective partners through social media, email communication, and various digital platforms to enhance the company's network and foster opportunities for collaboration.
Design promotional materials like captivating PowerPoint slides for our investors and for events, posters, brochures, and more.

Academic Requirements:

Currently enrolled in a Bachelor's or Master's Degree in Business, Marketing, or a related field.

Knowledge and skills:

Experience with Content Management Systems such as Wordpress or Wix.
Experience with Adobe Creative Suite Experience using the Adobe Creative Suite or equivalent (Photoshop, After Effects, Affinity Designer, Affinity Photo, etc).
Experience with UX/UI design is an asset.
Video, Animation, and Photography experience is an asset.
A strong attention to detail.
Able to work on concepts that are only loosely defined and with a relatively high-level direction.
Self-organized and time-efficient.
Able to articulate creative ideas in verbal and written communication.
Able to work on independent projects from start to finish.

Other Requirements:

Must be a Canadian Citizen, Permanent Resident or have refugee status as this position is grant-funded by the government.

Contact:

Please apply with your resume and transcript to pablo@wirelesspnc.com

We believe that diversity, equity, and inclusion are the foundation for innovation and is an integral part of our business. We believe that success happens where new ideas can flourish - in an inclusive environment that is rich in diversity and a place where people from various backgrounds can work together. As an equal-opportunity employer, Wireless Pnc Inc encourages applications from all qualified individuals, including candidates from underrepresented groups and communities. We invite all qualified candidates to apply online with their resume and transcript.
